it.polimi.se.eliafinazzigrazioli.adrenaline.server

Class ClientHandlerRMI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se.eliafinazzigrazioli.adrenaline.server.AbstractClientHandler
      • it.polimi.se.eliafinazzigrazioli.adrenaline.server.ClientHandlerRMI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientHandlerRMI
extends AbstractClientHandler
    Client handler implementation for RMI connection. It handles outgoing events calling a specific method on the client's remote reference object.

    Incoming objects are managed by ServerRMIManger, which exposes the remote interface.

      • send

        public void send(AbstractModelEvent event)
        Send method implementation. Calls the receive method on the remote object passing the event as a parameter. Unregisters the corresponding client from match in case of error.
        Specified by:
        send in class AbstractClientHandler
        Parameters:
        event - the event
